title: [Hopai's Magic Shoppe]
[Hopai's Outfitting]
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

The broad sweep of the wooden floor is interrupted by a worn rug.  Halfway to the wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A carved mahogany box and a plain wooden table are pushed close together in the back of the shop.
